Adventurer Guildsman:
The Buff Set for Warriors has Berserker Spirit, Might, Shield, Wind Walk, Focus, Death Whisper, Guidance, Bless Shield, Blessed Body, Haste, Agility and Vampiric Rage. The Buff Set for Wizards has Berserker Spirit, Magic Barrier, Shield, Wind Walk, Blessed Soul, Empower and Acumen.
Adventurers who are level 55 or higher can use the following Support Magic:
Buff Set for Warriors - 5600 points
Buff Set for Wizards - 1600 points
Berserker Spirit, level 2 - 500 points
Might, level 3 - 400 points
Shield, level 3 - 200 points
Wind Walk, level 2 - 300 points
Focus, level 3 - 800 points
Magic Barrier, level 2 - 400 points
Death Whisper, level 3 - 950 points
Guidance level 3 - 400 points
Bless Shield level 3 - 200 points
Blessed Body level 4 - 400 points
Blessed Soul, level 4 - 400 points
Haste, level 2 - 950 points
Agility, level 3 - 400 points
Vampiric Rage, level 3 - 400 points
Empower, level 3 - 400 points
Acumen, level 3 - 950 points
